body: If YoU aRe ReAdInG tHiS cOmMeNt YoUr PaReNtS wIlL dIe In ThE nExT 5 yEaRs. To UnDo ThIs CuRsE yOu NeEd To CoPy AnD pAsTe ThIs On 5 OtHeR mAnGa. I'm So, So SoRrY, pLeAsE fOrGiVe Me. I kNoW tHiS mAy SeEm NoNsEnSe BuT nOt GoNnA rIsK, bUt I dOn'T wAnNa CaUsE tOo MuCh TrOuBlE tOo So I tRy SeLeCt VeRy OlD mAnGa HoPe NoOnE rEaD tHiS cOmMeNt
